title: Topshop Opens in John Lewis in Bid to Regain UK Clothing Appeal
description: Topshop and Topman clothing is set to go on sale at John Lewis Partnership Plc on Tuesday, marking the brands’ first large-scale appearance on British high streets in five years.
content: Topshop and Topman clothing is set to go on sale at John Lewis Partnership Plc on Tuesday, marking the brands’ first large-scale appearance on British high streets in five years.
